SELECT B.CRC_STATE_ID, TO_CHAR(B.CRC_TRNSC_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS CRC_TRNSC_DT, B.CRC_TRNSC_MID, E.CODE_ID, D.ACC_DESC, (CASE WHEN SUM(B.CRC_TOT_NET_AMT) != 0 THEN SUM(B.CRC_TOT_NET_AMT) ELSE SUM(B.CRC_NET_AMT) END) AS NET_AMT FROM PAY0076D B JOIN PAY0075D C ON B.CRC_STATE_ID = C.CRC_STATE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0001M D ON C.CRC_STATE_ACC_ID = D.ACC_ID JOIN SYS0013M E ON D.ACC_CODE = E.CODE_NAME WHERE 1=1 AND KEYIN_STUS_ID = 4 AND B.BANK_MAPPING_STUS_ID = 1 AND E.CODE_MASTER_ID = 384 AND B.CRC_STATE_ID NOT IN (SELECT SubCrc.CRC_STATE_ID FROM( -- CREDIT CARD STATEMENT SELECT B.CRC_STATE_ID, B.CRC_TRNSC_MID, D.CODE_ID, B.CRC_TRNSC_DT, (CASE WHEN SUM(B.CRC_TOT_NET_AMT) != 0 THEN SUM(B.CRC_TOT_NET_AMT) ELSE SUM(B.CRC_NET_AMT) END) AS NET_AMT FROM PAY0075D A JOIN PAY0076D B ON A.CRC_STATE_ID = B.CRC_STATE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0001M C ON A.CRC_STATE_ACC_ID = C.ACC_ID JOIN SYS0013M D ON C.ACC_CODE = D.CODE_NAME WHERE 1=1 AND D.CODE_MASTER_ID = 384 AND KEYIN_STUS_ID = 4 AND B.BANK_MAPPING_STUS_ID = 1 GROUP BY B.CRC_STATE_ID, B.CRC_TRNSC_MID, D.CODE_ID, B.CRC_TRNSC_DT) SubCrc JOIN (SELECT B.F_TRNSC_ID, B.F_TRNSC_REF4 AS MID, SUM(B.F_TRNSC_CRDIT_AMT) AS CREDIT_AMT, B.F_TRNSC_DT, D.CODE_ID FROM PAY0079D A JOIN PAY0081D B ON A.F_BANK_JRNL_ID = B.F_BANK_JRNL_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0001M C ON A.F_BANK_JRNL_ACC_ID = C.ACC_ID JOIN SYS0013M D ON C.ACC_CODE = D.CODE WHERE B.F_TRNSC_REM = 'CRC' AND B.CRC_MAPPING_STUS_ID = 1 AND D.CODE_MASTER_ID = 384 GROUP BY B.F_TRNSC_ID, B.F_TRNSC_REF4, B.F_TRNSC_DT, D.CODE_ID ) SubBank ON SubCrc.CRC_TRNSC_MID = SubBank.MID and SubCrc.NET_AMT = SubBank.CREDIT_AMT and SubCrc.CODE_ID = SubBank.CODE_ID)
AND B.CRC_TRNSC_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{tranCrcDateFr}, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AND TO_DATE(#{tranCrcDateTo}, 'DD/MM/YYYY')
AND E.CODE_ID = #{bankAccount}
GROUP BY B.CRC_STATE_ID,B.CRC_TRNSC_MID, B.CRC_TRNSC_DT, E.CODE_ID, D.ACC_DESC ORDER BY B.CRC_TRNSC_DT DESC

SELECT B.F_TRNSC_ID, TO_CHAR(B.F_TRNSC_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS F_TRNSC_DT, B.F_TRNSC_REF4 AS MID, D.ACC_DESC, E.CODE_ID, B.F_TRNSC_CRDIT_AMT AS CREDIT_AMT , B.F_TRNSC_DEBT_AMT AS DEBT_AMT FROM PAY0081D B JOIN PAY0079D C ON B.F_BANK_JRNL_ID = C.F_BANK_JRNL_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0001M D ON C.F_BANK_JRNL_ACC_ID = D.ACC_ID JOIN SYS0013M E ON D.ACC_CODE = E.CODE WHERE B.F_TRNSC_REM = 'CRC' AND B.CRC_MAPPING_STUS_ID = 1 AND E.CODE_MASTER_ID = 384 AND B.F_TRNSC_ID NOT IN( SELECT SubBank.F_TRNSC_ID FROM( -- CREDIT CARD STATEMENT SELECT B.CRC_STATE_ID, B.CRC_TRNSC_MID, D.CODE_ID, B.CRC_TRNSC_DT, (CASE WHEN SUM(B.CRC_TOT_NET_AMT) != 0 THEN SUM(B.CRC_TOT_NET_AMT) ELSE SUM(B.CRC_NET_AMT) END) AS NET_AMT FROM PAY0075D A JOIN PAY0076D B ON A.CRC_STATE_ID = B.CRC_STATE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0001M C ON A.CRC_STATE_ACC_ID = C.ACC_ID JOIN SYS0013M D ON C.ACC_CODE = D.CODE_NAME WHERE 1=1 AND D.CODE_MASTER_ID = 384 AND KEYIN_STUS_ID = 4 AND B.BANK_MAPPING_STUS_ID = 1 GROUP BY B.CRC_STATE_ID, B.CRC_TRNSC_MID, D.CODE_ID, B.CRC_TRNSC_DT) SubCrc JOIN (--BANK STATEMENT SELECT B.F_TRNSC_ID, B.F_TRNSC_REF4 AS MID, SUM(B.F_TRNSC_CRDIT_AMT) AS CREDIT_AMT, B.F_TRNSC_DT, D.CODE_ID FROM PAY0079D A JOIN PAY0081D B ON A.F_BANK_JRNL_ID = B.F_BANK_JRNL_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0001M C ON A.F_BANK_JRNL_ACC_ID = C.ACC_ID JOIN SYS0013M D ON C.ACC_CODE = D.CODE WHERE B.F_TRNSC_REM = 'CRC' AND B.CRC_MAPPING_STUS_ID = 1 AND D.CODE_MASTER_ID = 384 GROUP BY B.F_TRNSC_ID, B.F_TRNSC_REF4, B.F_TRNSC_DT, D.CODE_ID) SubBank ON SubCrc.CRC_TRNSC_MID = SubBank.MID and SubCrc.NET_AMT = SubBank.CREDIT_AMT and SubCrc.CODE_ID = SubBank.CODE_ID)
AND B.F_TRNSC_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{tranDateFr}, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AND TO_DATE(#{tranDateTo}, 'DD/MM/YYYY')
AND E.CODE_ID = #{bankAccount}
ORDER BY B.F_TRNSC_DT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITF0940M ( IF_KEY, SEQ, IF_TYPE, TRAN_STATUS_CD, MAPP_DATE, BANKSEQ, BANK_AC, CRC_AC, TRANDATE, MID_NO, APPROVENO, CRC_ID, BANK_ID, CRC_AMT, BANK_AMT, DIF_AMT ) VALUES( FN_CRT_IFKEY('940'), 1, '940', '10', TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{mappingDate}, 'DD/MM/YYYY'),'YYYYMMDD'), #{bankSeq}, (SELECT CODE FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_ID = #{codeId}), (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_ID = #{codeId}), TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{trnscDate}, 'DD/MM/YYYY'),'YYYYMMDD'), #{mid} , #{appvNo}, #{crcId}, #{bankId}, #{grosAmt}, #{creditAmt}, #{diffAmt} )
